Introduction

Lee Seungah known as Mijoo is a Korean singer, she is a member of the Kpop girl group Lovelyz. In August 2018 she legally changed her name to Lee Seungah from Lee Mijoo however she will still promote as Mijoo with Lovelyz, Mijoo will be her stage name now.

She debuted as a member of Lovelyz with their first studio album Girls' Invasion on November 17, 2014.

On November 1, 2021, Woollim Entertainment announced that 7 of the members, except Baby Soul, had chosen not to renew their contracts which expired on November 16.

On November 17, 2021, Antenna confirmed that Mijoo signed with them. She made her solo debut with the single album "Movie Star" on May 17th, 2023
